resources.string:
You have to chose a person that will show the words to the rest.

 Then the person draws the word and starts to show it.

 He has only 1.5 minute to make the word guessed.

 The person that guessed the word correct is the next to show.

Divide yourselves into 2 teams.

 Each team chooses the person that will show the words.

 Delegates stand before teams and draw a words to show and start showing - each person shows word to his team.

 If the teams guessed their word - they get the point, but if they guessed the enemies word - the enemies get the point
